metadata.title: CVE-2023-22018 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). Supported versions that are affected are Prior to 6.1.46and Prior to 7.0.10. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allowsunauthenticated attacker with network access via RDP to compromise OracleVM VirtualBox. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result intakeover of Oracle VM VirtualBox. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 8.1 (Confidentiality,Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
